name: Should I do Certified ScrumMaster training (CSM) or Certified Scrum Product Owner training (CSPO) training?
description: Facing a dilemma on whether to do CSM or CSPO training? It all comes down to identifying your specific needs. If you haven't yet read the outlines of the Scrum Master and Scrum Product Owner roles in the Scrum Guide, that's a good place to start. When it comes to choosing certified scrum training, here's ...
